definitions.definition: a truck, or a container with wheels, that is pulled by another vehicle

examples.text: a car towing a trailer with a boat on it

definitions.definition: a vehicle without an engine, that can be pulled by a car or truck or used as a home or an office when it is parked

examples.text: a **trailer park** *(= an area where trailers are parked and used as homes)*

definitions.definition: a small building for people to live in that is made in a factory and moved to a permanent place
definitions.labels: (North American English)especially in North American English

definitions.definition: a series of short scenes from a film or television programme, shown in advance to advertise it
definitions.labels: (especially British English)North American English usually(especially British English)

examples.text: He featured in the trailer for the movie.
The review said that if you've seen the trailer, you needn't bother watching this film.
